data.approach: Move drag/drop event handlers from the small dropzone div to the entire drawer panel. Add a full-drawer overlay that appears on drag. Keep the existing small dropzone for click-to-browse. Prevent browser default navigation on missed drops.

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Task Creation Drag-and-Drop Functionality
suggestedTasks.description:
Create comprehensive unit and integration tests to validate drag-and-drop behaviors in the task creation drawer. Tests should cover scenarios like multi-file upload, file type validation, and edge cases in different browser environments.

Target files for testing: cli/squad and associated UI component files. Ensure tests simulate various drag events and validate expected interactions.
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve test coverage for newly implemented drag-and-drop feature
